name: Deenji Real Estate Platform
description: A real estate platform like Zillow but enhanced with LLMs, connecting property buyers and agents with powerful search, detailed property insights, and investment analytics.
systemPrompt: You are assisting with the development of Deenji, a real estate platform enhanced with LLMs. The platform connects property buyers and agents, offering powerful search, detailed property insights, and investment analytics. Focus on helping users make data-driven property decisions, ensuring mobile responsiveness, and supporting multi-language features including Persian with RTL layout.

groups.name: Architecture Overview
groups.description: High-level architecture and tech stack of the Deenji platform
groups.systemPrompt: This group provides an overview of the technical architecture and design decisions for the Deenji platform. Use this context to understand the project's structure, technology choices, and design patterns.

items.content:
Deenji is built with a modern tech stack including:
- Frontend: Angular/AnalogJS for the UI
- Backend: Node.js/tRPC for type-safe API
- Database: PostgreSQL with Supabase
- Search: Elasticsearch for property search
- Maps: MapBox/Neshan for interactive maps
- Charts: Recharts for analytics visualizations
- Styling: TailwindCSS for responsive design
- Multi-language support: i18n with RTL layout for Persian

The application follows a sprint-based development approach:
Sprint 1: User management (authentication, profiles)
Sprint 2: Basic/advanced search, list view, saved properties
Sprint 3: Map view, property cards, details, images
Sprint 4: Analytics dashboard and investment scoring
